regen.absent_element: displaying the last reported known values with report time during data link interruption
regen.new_specification: During a data link interruption, the system shall present the last known AV status and fuel parameters along with the time of the last report.

regen.absent_element: presenting the report time when data link is interrupted
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall present the time at which the last known AV status values were reported when data link is interrupted.

regen.absent_element: presentation of last reported known fuel parameters with report time during data link interruption
regen.new_specification: When the data link is interrupted, the TCS shall present the last reported known fuel parameters along with the report time.

label: When the data link is interrupted, the TCS also shall present the time at which the last AV status values were reported
absence: action of presenting the time at which the last AV status
